summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Student Attendance Management System. Backend APIs are working excellently (95.8% success rate). Frontend UI is functional with successful login flows for all three user roles (Admin, Faculty, Student). Key features like attendance marking, reporting, and eligibility calculation are working correctly.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthenticated access
minor_issues.impact: Very minor - both status codes indicate authentication failure

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay blocking clicks in some dropdown selections

integration_issues.issue: Invalid login errors shown via toast notifications but not easily detectable by automated tests

issues: Console warnings about missing Description for DialogContent components

passed_tests: All three user role authentications (Admin, Faculty, Student)
Admin navigation between sections (Departments, Courses, Subjects, Users)
Faculty dashboard with assigned subjects and sessions count
Faculty attendance marking functionality with student list and toggle
Faculty reports generation with attendance percentages and eligibility status
Student dashboard with attendance summary cards
Student subject-wise attendance table with percentages
Student exam eligibility calculation and display
Logout functionality for all user roles
Toast notification system for user feedback
Eligibility badge display (green for >=75%, red for <75%)
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor UI improvements needed: 1) Fix modal overlay issues in admin CRUD operations to prevent click blocking, 2) Add proper aria-describedby attributes to Dialog components to remove console warnings. These are non-critical issues and the system is fully functional.
